trans-unit.source: Specifies the filter string and filter type to use for a toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 指定的篩選條件字串和工具箱項目所使用的篩選器類型。

trans-unit.source: ToolboxItemFilterAttribute provides a mechanism by which toolbox items can be marked for use only with designers that have a matching attribute or code that determines whether the item should be enabled or disabled in the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: ToolboxItemFilterAttribute 提供由哪些工具箱項目可以標記只能擁有相符的屬性或決定項目是否應該啟用或停用工具箱 中的程式碼設計工具搭配使用的機制。

trans-unit.source: A ToolboxItemFilterAttribute can be applied to a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> to indicate a filter string and filter type that specify when to enable or disable the item.
trans-unit.target: ToolboxItemFilterAttribute 可以套用至<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>表示篩選字串和篩選器類型，指定何時可以啟用或停用項目。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: ToolboxItemFilterAttribute can also be applied to a designer to indicate its requirements for enabling items in the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: ToolboxItemFilterAttribute 也可以套用至設計工具，以指出其需求，啟用 [工具箱] 中的項目。

trans-unit.source: This type of attribute can be used to indicate that a toolbox item can only be enabled when a designer with a matching filter string is being used.
trans-unit.target: 這種類型的屬性可以用來表示正在使用與相符的篩選條件字串的設計工具時，才可以啟用工具箱項目。

trans-unit.source: The type of the filter is indicated in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute.FilterType%2A> property by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterType> that indicates whether and how a filter string match is used, or whether to use custom code to determine whether to enable an item.
trans-unit.target: 篩選類型示<xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute.FilterType%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterType>，指出是否及如何使用篩選條件字串比對，或是否要使用自訂程式碼來判斷是否要啟用項目。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute.FilterType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"></xref> class using the specified filter string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"></xref>類別使用指定的篩選條件字串。

trans-unit.source: The filter string for the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 工具箱項目之篩選條件字串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"></xref> class using the specified filter string and type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"></xref>類別使用指定的篩選條件字串和類型。

trans-unit.source: The filter string for the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 工具箱項目之篩選條件字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterType"></xref> indicating the type of the filter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterType"> </xref>指出篩選器的類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個執行個體是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> to compare with this instance or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>比較與這個執行個體或 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if obj equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 具有相同的類型和值，這個執行個體; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the filter string for the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 取得篩選條件字串工具箱項目。

trans-unit.source: The filter string for the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: 工具箱項目之篩選條件字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the filter.
trans-unit.target: 取得篩選條件類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the filter, along with any existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute> on the current designer, indicates the rules to use to determine whether a particular toolbox item should be enabled in the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: 篩選器，以及任何現有的型別<xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute>目前的設計工具，表示要使用特定的工具箱項目是否應該啟用工具箱 中的規則。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterType"></xref> that indicates the type of the filter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterType"> </xref>指出篩選器的類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified object has a matching filter string.
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的物件是否有相符的篩選條件字串。

trans-unit.source: The object to test for a matching filter string.
trans-unit.target: 要測試相符的篩選條件字串的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object has a matching filter string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的物件有相符的篩選字串。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type ID for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性的型別 ID。

trans-unit.source: The type ID for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的型別識別碼。

trans-unit.source: All <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"></xref> objects with the same filter string return the same type ID.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"></xref>物件具有相同的篩選條件字串傳回相同的類型識別碼。
